strapiPost.title: Mount Up For The Rodeo Of The Ozarks In Springdale This Week
strapiPost.content:
Saddle up for four nights of rodeo action during the 78th annual Rodeo of the Ozarks at Parsons Stadium in Springdale from Jun 21-24, beginning with the Rodeo Parade down Emma St. on Wednesday, Jun 21, at 10a.

  • Nightly action: Gates open at 5:30p daily with nightly themes like Faith & Family Night, Hispanic Heritage Night, "Rope Your Dreams" Night, and Let Freedom Ring Night.
  • Family fun: Witness heart-stopping rodeo competitions, hear talented musicians, laugh at hilarious clowns, and shop western lifestyle vendors while eating finger-licking-good rodeo food. Sign your kids up for the Mutton Bustin Championship for some real fun!

Check out more about the event and find tickets HERE.
